name: Alps and Dangerous Forests
description:
It is an action game where you control the powerless girl Alps and aim for the exit of the forest.

The operation is simple, and we will proceed while solving a light mystery.

Because the Alps do not have combat ability
You can only escape from the oncoming threats or use gimmicks to resist.

Because there is no battle element etc., the flow until it is caught
The emphasis is on directing the situation.

To emphasize the flow to the etch scene and the sense of presence
Dealing with it at first sight is a little difficult.

Instead, even if it fails, it will return immediately before
From the second time onward, the failure event will be skipped.
You can try again at a good tempo.

Also, even if you miss the etch scene, check it from the area select
By playing that part, you can enjoy it in a series of steps.

Of course, you can also browse the scenes you saw once from the gallery.

Key configuration is possible, and it also supports game pads.

Please check the operation with the trial version before purchasing.
